data.persona: I am a poor farm worker. I don't know how to read or write. I am dependable.
data.description:
You are in the Dining Hall.
Long, wooden tables line both walls of the massive dining hall. There is also an ornately carved head table at the front of the room. Benches sit in front of the tables to seat everyone. Massive, golden chandeliers hang from the ceiling. Colorful stained glass windows shed vast arrays of light onto the floor and walls.
There's a silverware, a Long, wooden tables, a wooden table, a stained glass, a Bench, and a chandelier here.
The guest is here.

You are carrying a shovel and a seed, and wearing a shoes.

data.short_motivation: I want to steal the stained glass
data.mid_motivation: I want to put the stained glass in my farm to make it look pretty
data.long_motivation: I want everyone to love looking at my farm, and I want them to respect me

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go bed and wait for people to see my improved farm
